thread.title: Hillary's State Dept. paid men more than women
thread.title_full: Hillary's State Dept. paid men more than women

author: -NO AUTHOR-
title: Hillary's State Dept. paid men more than women
text:
Hillary's State Dept. paid men more than women Earned $16,000 more on average in annual salary Published: 3 hours ago 
(FREE BEACON) Hillary Clinton’s State Department paid men $16,000 more on average in annual salary than women, according to data from the Office of Personnel Management (OPM). 
An OPM database called FedScope contains data on more than 2 million federal civilian employees and includes information about employment, including gender, age, education level, and pay grade. 
The data, which is organized by calendar year, shows that men were paid more than women in each year that Clinton was heading the department as secretary of state.
